body:
Comment 10 by **toni@tcardenas.me**: 
Sorry, bad English, I meant a 'var data [500]string = [...]string{ ... 500 literal
strings ... }'.

But I just got rid of it and generated it at init() time, and the problem remains. I
stopped Apache and MySQL and it managed to compile, but according to this tool I just
found [1] it has a peak ~354988 kB memory usage.

[1] https://gist.github.com/netj/526585
